Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: http://i.imgur.com/kVxAwL1.png
market bazaar

Baking under the heat of the scorching sun,Lit by the glow of the moon and sporadic hanging lanterns, this long, open-air marketplace boasts bright, colorful fabrics hanging high over a wooden framework, draping down on either side. Various stalls bearing a myriad of wares, line the sides of the corridor, separated by large, intricate tapestries. An arched frame surrounds each stall with equally bright fabrics and curtains draping from it. A single, plush rug extends the length of the entire area, cushioning your feet as you move through it. Merchants, sailors, hawkers and tradespeople wander through the area looking to make deals.The chaotic buzz of the day's activity has calmed to a murmur, though tradespeople and sailors still occasionally pass through the area intent on some business.

Baking under the heat of the scorching sun,Lit by the glow of the moon and sporadic hanging lanterns, this long, open-air marketplace boasts bright, colorful fabrics hanging high over a wooden framework, draping down on either side. Merchants, sailors, hawkers and tradespeople wander through the area looking to make deals.The chaotic buzz of activity has calmed to a murmur, though tradespeople and sailors still occasionally pass through the area.

Baking under the heat of the scorching sun,Lit by the glow of the moon and sporadic hanging lanterns, this long, open-air marketplace boasts bright, colorful fabrics hanging high over a wooden framework, draping down on either side. Various stalls bearing a myriad of wares, line the sides of the corridor, separated by large, intricate tapestries. An arched frame surrounds each stall with equally bright fabrics and curtains draping from it. A single, plush rug extends the length of the entire area, cushioning your feet as you move through it. Merchants, sailors, hawkers and tradespeople wander through the area looking to make deals.The chaotic buzz of activity has calmed to a murmur, though tradespeople and sailors still occasionally pass through the area.
a shimmering indigo curtain
A relatively small stall with a wooden arched frame. A shimmering indigo curtain provides entrance.
a bright yellow curtain
A relatively small stall with a wooden arched frame. A bright yellow curtain provides entrance.
a seashell white curtain
A relatively small stall with a wooden arched frame. A seashell white curtain provides entrance.
a sparkling emerald curtain
A relatively small stall with a wooden arched frame. A sparkling emerald curtain provides entrance.
a flowing cerulean curtain
A relatively small stall with a wooden arched frame. A flowing cerulean curtain provides entrance.
a vibrant scarlet curtain
A relatively small stall with a wooden arched frame. A vibrant scarlet curtain provides entrance.
a midnight black curtain
A relatively small stall with a wooden arched frame. A midnight black curtain provides entrance.
an antique ivory curtain
A relatively small stall with a wooden arched frame. An antique ivory curtain provides entrance.
a sunshine orange curtain
A relatively small stall with a wooden arched frame. A sunshine orange curtain provides entrance.
the steps leading up to the tea house
A series wide stone steps lead up to the tea house north of here. Looking through, you can see:
A series of wide stone steps lead up to the tea house north of here. Looking through, you can see:
a domed yellow birch door leading to the old trade house
A domed yellow birch door leads to the old trade house. Looking through, you can see:
A domed yellow birch door leads to the old trade house. Looking through, you can see:
the steps leading down to the cobbled street
Three low broad steps lead down the cobbled street south of here. Looking down the steps, you can see:
Three low broad steps lead down the promenade south of here. Looking down the steps, you can see:
the eastern side of the market bazaar

Various stalls line the eastern side of the corridor, separated by large, intricate tapestries. An arched frame surrounds each stall with equally bright fabrics and curtains draping from it. Tucked into the northeastern portion is a domed yellow birch door.
Various stalls line the eastern side of the corridor, separated by large, intricate tapestries. An arched frame surrounds each stall with equally bright fabrics and curtains draping from it.
the long, colorful plush rug covering the area
A long, colorful plush rug extends down the corridor, covering the ground beneath.
A long, colorful plush rug extends down the corridor, covering the ground beneath.
the scorching heatresidual heat from the day
The heat is sweltering and overwhelming.slowly waning with the cool of night.
some colorful lanterns
Colorful lanterns hang from the overhead framework, providing subtle illumination to the area.
Colorful lanterns hang from the overhead framework, providing subtle illumination to the area.
the scorching sunluminous moon

Base:Description.midnight: The moon sits high at the apex of the sky, indicating the midnight hour.
Base:Description.aftermidnight: It is after midnight, the moon beginning the slow descent toward the western horizon.
Base:Description.dawn: The sun peeks over the eastern horizon, indicating the arrival of dawn.
Base:Description.morning: The sun climbs higher in the eastern sky as morning progresses toward midday.
Base:Description.midday: The sun sits high at the apex of the sky.
Base:Description.afternoon: The sun begins its descent toward the western horizon.
Base:Description.dusk: The rays of the sun slant low over the land as sunset approaches.
Base:Description.evening: The moon begins climbing up the eastern half of the sky.

Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the middle of the area
The middle of the area.
The middle of the area.
the bluestar-studded sky overhead
The bluestar-studded sky overhead is clear and cloudless.
The bluestar-studded sky overhead is clear and cloudless.
the western side of the market bazaar
Various stalls line the western side of the corridor, separated by large, intricate tapestries. An arched frame surrounds each stall with equally bright fabrics and curtains draping from it.
Various stalls line the western side of the corridor, separated by large, intricate tapestries. An arched frame surrounds each stall with equally bright fabrics and curtains draping from it.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ \ \{ The soft murmur of voices muffled by distance carries through the otherwise quiet area. \| A lone sailor hurries through the area, his footfalls muffled by the carpet underfoot as he bustles away into the night. \| A small vermin scuttles hurriedly past your feet, searching the quiet marketplace for leftovers. \| An adolescent boy in dark robes skulks slowly from one stall to the next before noticing your presence. Without a sound, he melts back into the shadows like a wisp. \| A woman in dancer's garb slowly approaches before continuing into the distance behind you, her belled ankle bracelets jangling slowly with each sinuous step. \| A lantern sputters with a soft pop, the flickering light causing shadows to dance over the confusion of draping fabrics all around. \| A group of young men burst into the market bazaar with a bevy of activity and loud hoots, approaching the deep shadows between two stalls nearby and seemingly disappearing before your very eyes, the fading sound of their voices the only indication that they had passed at all. \| A window on the second-floor of a nearby building is illuminated as a lamp is lit from within. \| A skinny slave girl wearing only a chest wrap and a loincloth scuttles hurriedly through the area, carrying a large satchel slung over her bony shoulder. \| The sound of a ship bell can barely be heard in the distance, the night otherwise subdued and quiet. \| The cloudless, starlit sky above casts a dim, luminescent glow over the area. \| The air around you is cool in the dim moonglow of night. \| The air is still in the dark of night, the luminescent glow of the sky casting dark shadows all around. \| The stars above twinkle in the dark indigo of the night sky. \} \ \ \{ The rose-gold hue of dawn kisses the eastern horizon. \| The slowly rising sun washes the land in a rosy-golden light. \} \ \ \{ A group of well-dressed men in lavish robes slowly mills through the area, the crowds parting around them as they cavalierly peruse the wares. \| A small group of women dressed in opulent and colorful robes drift through the market bazaar, giggling softly to one another behind face veils as the crowds part and shift around them. \| The press of bodies in the bustling marketplace is almost unbearable under the added heat of the sun overhead. \| Scents of shisha, spice, food and bodies baking under the desert sun are an overwhelming assault on the senses. \| A hawker wheeling a barrow overflowing with scarves, veils and sashes moves haphazardly through the area, eliciting cries of consternation that are drowned out by his insistent calls. \| A man in the distance lets out a loud holler, angrily gesticulating at a small boy in a loincloth who sprints away before he is lost to view in the throngs of people. \| A pair of men in merchant's garb get into a heated argument just outside one of the nearby stalls, raised voices carrying over the perpetual din of the busy bazaar. \| A woman in dancer's dress slowly minces along the outskirts of the bazaar, loitering in front of one of the stalls before an elderly woman in full robes hustles her along with a hand broom and a stern word. \| A tall, skinny man in modest attire walks through with a large pitcher propped against his hip. A bony child reluctantly hands over a small coin, eagerly taking the ladle of water from the man before disappearing again into the press of the crowds. \| The sounds of bartering, arguing, conversation and song mix together into an indiscernible din of chaos and noise. \| The sun bears down from overhead, oppressively hot and burning. \| The oppressive heat surrounds your body as the scorching sun proceeds through the sky \| The oppressive heat of the day seems to radiate from all around. \| The cloying heat of the day is oppressive and stifling, the sun beating down in shimmering waves. \} \ \ \{ The sun dips lower toward the western horizon as the light shifts to a deeper red hue with the approach of sunset. \| The western sky is painted in strokes of burgundy and gold as dusk slowly approaches. \} \ \}
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "You catch the muffled sound of the evening bell."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The deep sound of midday bells is heard from outside."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "Outside, the bells announce midnight."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The church bells herald the morning."); return TRUE;
